sn14.3:1.2: “Mendicants, diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts. Diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.
sn14.3:1.3: And what is the diversity of elements?
sn14.3:1.4: The eye element, ear element, nose element, tongue element, body element, and mind element.
sn14.3:1.6: This is called the diversity of elements.
sn14.3:2.1: And how does diversity of elements give rise to diversity of contacts, while diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements?
sn14.3:2.2: The eye element gives rise to eye contact. Eye contact doesn’t give rise to the eye element. …
sn14.3:2.3: The mind element gives rise to mind contact. Mind contact doesn’t give rise to the mind element.
sn14.3:2.4: That’s how diversity of elements gives rise to diversity of contacts, while diversity of contacts doesn’t give rise to diversity of elements.”
